about_the_game:
The Las Vegas off-road track hosted the 2016 IFMAR World Championships, won by Swedish top-racer David Ronnefalk. The 290m long track is very technical to master especially because the worn state of the track. A real challenge for the die-hard off-road r/c racer!

This track has been released on the VRC platform and is now available as individual track. Later this new track will become part of a 5-track expansion pack.
detailed_description:
The Las Vegas off-road track hosted the 2016 IFMAR World Championships, won by Swedish top-racer David Ronnefalk. The 290m long track is very technical to master especially because the worn state of the track. A real challenge for the die-hard off-road r/c racer!

This track has been released on the VRC platform and is now available as individual track. Later this new track will become part of a 5-track expansion pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP 3, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Hyperthreaded Intel CPU, AMD Athlon 64 CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Pixel Shader 2.0 graphics card (nVidia GeForce FX 5600 or ATI Radeon X600)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Windows 10, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Multi-core CPU (Intel Core i5 or i7, AMD Phenom II QUAD X4)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated RAM, Pixel Shader 3.0 graphics card (AMD Radeon HD 5870, nVidia GTX 560)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: VRC USB adapter or controller, for hosting multiplayer sessions high upstream connection is recommended

short_description: The Las Vegas off-road track hosted the 2016 IFMAR World Championships, won by Swedish top-racer David Ronnefalk. The 290m long track is very technical to master especially because the worn state of the track. A real challenge for the die-hard off-road r/c racer!
